div.bibl: Scrapbook, Vol. IV, of Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill. FOUNDERS' MEETING OF RUSSIAN MEDICAL SOCIETY OF CHICAGO

body.p: This meeting was called for July 18, 1924 at the Great Northern Hotel.
It was signed by the organization committee, composed of A. I. Nedzelnitsky; N. J. Popov; M. Sahud; Y. L. Spivak; I. Treiger; H. R. Krasnow was temporary secretary.
